prompt_id: string - Unique identifier in format FEP-XXX-###
context: string - Brief situational description where the prompt is applied
goal: string - The emotional safeguard or relational outcome intended
compliance_laws: list - Which of the Four Natural Laws of Empathic Systems are being upheld (I, II, III, IV)
example_prompt: string - The actual structured prompt text to be used or adapted
response_expectation: string - How the model/system should behave in response
misuse_note: string - Cautions, known risks, or misuses to avoid
